member.name: M:SPMeta2.SSOM.Extensions.SPContextExtensions.WithFakeSPContextScope(Microsoft.SharePoint.SPWeb,System.Action)
member.summary: Util method to be able to deplot CQWP from c#/ps code outside of SPContext.Curent == null context More details here: http://solutionizing.net/2009/02/16/faking-spcontext/ http://blog.mastykarz.nl/structured-and-repeatable-deployment-of-content-query-web-part-instances/

member.name: T:SPMeta2.SSOM.PublishingPageTemplates
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:SPMeta2.SSOM.PublishingPageTemplates.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:SPMeta2.SSOM.PublishingPageTemplates.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:SPMeta2.SSOM.PublishingPageTemplates.RedirectionPageMarkup
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to <%@ Page Inherits="Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing.TemplateRedirectionPage,Microsoft.SharePoint.Publishing,Version=14.0.0.0,Culture=neutral,PublicKeyToken=71e9bce111e9429c" %> <%@ Reference VirtualPath="~TemplatePageUrl" %> <%@ Reference VirtualPath="~masterurl/custom.master" %>.
